name: Antica Residenza Cicogna

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Antica Residenza Cicogna
reviews.title: Good stay - would recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Stayed here for one night in July 2009.
reviews.title: Antica Residenza Cicogna is a great place to stay when visiting Siena

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location: Fantastic, quick walk to all the main sights, easy to access from the bus station (maybe a 10 minute walk on cobbled/winding streets).
reviews.title: Highly recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms/amenities: the room was very traditional with an antique feel. Our small TV didn’t work, but we were only there for a night and were out the whole time so not a big deal for us. The room/bathroom were on the smaller side, overall average but completely acceptable. We were leaving at 5am the next day so didn’t have the buffet breakfast, but the gentleman kindly left out some packaged breakfast goods for us to take on the go, a very nice touch.
reviews.title: Lovely B&B in Siena

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service: was fine, you just let them know what time you’re going to be there and they show up to let you in. You could apparently use the internet for free but no one ever gave us instructions/password, so be sure to ask when you check-in.
reviews.title: No way to reach owner in case of an emergency, and no phones

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Antica Residenza della Cicogna was really lovely. Great location in the middle of Siena. Elisa was very friendly and helpful. The room (Stanza della Liberty) was spacious and very comfortable - the four poster bed was great. Bathroom was very clean. Breakfast was very good too and there was free tea and coffee throughout the day. A good library of guide books and internet too. Lots of atmosphere - would thoroughly recommend it. Grazie Elisa!
reviews.title: Very cosy and romantic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great B&B. A great location, right in the heart of Siena. Elisa was very helpful and made us feel comfortable. Computer service in the B&B so no need to find internet cafe.
reviews.title: Lucky find!! Hope to visit again---

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was nice. We would recommend to anyone and hopefully will be back again.
reviews.title: Great Place for a winter trip to Siena!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks Elisa,
reviews.title: Great and convenient B&B inside Siena City Walls

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Jim and Cheryl
reviews.title: Excellent B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Liberty Room in April, which I had especially requested. I was better than we expected. The room was spacious,clean comfortable and quiet.
reviews.title: A room for a princess

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It had an lcd tv with BBC news, CNN, aircon, free wifi and a clean bathroom.
reviews.title: The best room in Italy!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had come by train from Pisa and found the local bus from the station to the centre os Siena easily and then it was a short easy walk.
reviews.title: Wonderful B&B in the heart of Siena

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Elise and her Dad Fabio were very helpful with maps and restaurant recommendations.
reviews.title: Style in the Middle of Siena

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010
reviews.text: We had one our our best meals during our month in Italy at "La Taverna San Guiseppe"
reviews.title: Lovely, comfortable room and great cappucino.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the glowing reviews are true! My husband and I had a wonderful 3 night stay at Antica Residenza Cicogna. We stayed in the suite--one room with a large, super comfortable bed, all lovely antique furniture. The adjoining room has a desk and two single beds--we used this room to spread out our luggage--how nice to have room for all of our stuff! The bathroom was spotless. It felt more like an apartment than a room! This suite is located in the same building as the rest of the rooms, but around the other side of the building with a separate door and entryway. It was a great price. Breakfast was very tasty and plenty to eat. Best of all was darling Elisa--she could not have been nicer. She is wonderful at answering any questions by email or phone. Elisa has furnished her B & B with beautiful antique furniture, keeps everything spotless, is really the perfect hostess. All of her rooms are wonderful, but if you want the feel of being in your own apartment, try for the suite--we loved it!! We hope to return soon to unique Siena and Elisa's Antica Residenza Cicogna!
reviews.title: Can't wait to return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a more than satisfactory 9 nights stay in this beautiful B&B.
reviews.title: Great B&B in Siena

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Antica Residenza Cicogna is located right in the historic centre of Siena, only five minutes walk from Campo, in a renovated building dating back from the middle ages, as are most of the building in Siena. Its decoration and furniture is very carefully selected and the result as a whole is really charming.
reviews.title: Lovely B & B in great central location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Elisa and Fabio, the owners, were very helpful and polite.
reviews.title: Wonderful romantic Band B in Siena

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are only a few rooms (five I think). We had the "Liberty" room which is full of frescos, very comfortable and with elegant furniture. It was very clean and quite. The rest of the rooms are equally nice. The breakfast was ok and we have to mention the great cappuccinos that our hosts always prepared for us. At that time, the internet access was through an old apple computer right from... the middle ages but who cares?
reviews.title: Everything you'd want PLUS a ceiling that has frescoes!

description: The Antica Residenza Cicogna, the old house of Cicogna family, is located in the historical city center of Siena. You will be welcomed from Elisa, Ilaria or Fabio, which will be always happy to help you with tips or informations. Our five double rooms and our two suites are all frescoed with original 19° and 20° centuries frescoes and are equipped with air conditioning, private bathroom and free internet WiFi. Our rich breakfast buffet is served every morning in a nice breakfast room and any time during the day you can have your tea or traditional biscuits helping yourself in our dining room, reading a book or checking your emails on our free internet point.We look forward to meet you!
